Text: Elizabeth Sager Vacation Cc Good morning Elizabeth Sager will be out of the office on vacation Thursday afternoon October through Monday October She will return to the office on Tuesday October but will be available via her cell phone Elizabeth and her family are traveling to Washington DC to visit her brother and his family Should you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me Alice Wright Assistant to Elizabeth Sager Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax
Master NettingDavid asked that I email this to you Elizabeth wanted the signature blocks on separate pages The document is located on the OLegalESagerAEP Thanks Al

Tuesday Power Trading Group Meeting Cc Hello all Due to the allemployee meeting being held tomorrow at the Hyatt Elizabeth has cancelled the Power Trading Group Meeting We will plan to meet next month at our regularly scheduled time Thanks Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Update on Kays FatherHello everyone Kay Manns father is in the hospital in Fort Worth and scheduled to have triple bypass surgery tomorrow morning at amPlease keep Kay and her family in your thoughts and prayers Thanks Al Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Kay Manns FatherI regret to inform you that Kay Manns father passed away this morning I will get funeral arrangement details to you as soon as I receive them I will also send flowers on behalf of the company Please keep Kays family in your thoughts and prayers today Thanks Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Arrangements for Kays FatherGood morning Funeral services for Kay Manns father are below Laurel Land Funeral Home Crowley Road Fort Worth Texas Friday October pm to pm Visitation Saturday October pm Funeral Service Kay indicated in her message that she would probably not be in the office on Monday I will give you an update as I receive it Thank you Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Genia FitzGerald UpdateHello As you know Genia underwent surgery this morning and she came through with flying colors The surgery lasted approximately hours and the procedure went with no complications She is in recovery Thanks Please forward to those who may be interested Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Family Issues Cc This morning after I left home my son Joshua had a fever convulsion and passed out Zane called and believing Josh wasnt breathing gave him mouth to mouth until his breathing stabilized Josh is okay now but he has a severe inner ear infection The emts sent Zane to our pediatricians office where they immediately examined Josh and did blood work His white blood count is extremely elevated which apparently is normal after the trauma of a seizure after such a fever spike They are home now but my husband is quite shaken and so am I Im not really up to discussing this today To make a long story short I plan to catch the pm bus home today I will be back in tomorrow at am and at full speed I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

Invoices Cc Good morning I forwarded to you over the last three weeks approximately to invoices for codingKay Mann wants to resolve these invoices today Will you please code the invoices as the following or return them to me My last day at Enron is tomorrow pm so if you dont get them to me please process them and inform Kay Mann of the status Coral Energy Cost Center Project Blue Dog Split between Cost Centers and Midway Energy WBS C or Cost Center second choice Thank you very much for your prompt attention to this matter Alice Wright Assistant to Kay Mann Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

RE FavorSpoke with Steve and he said to call Ben and let him know the has been pushed to I left a voicemail for Ben Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Friday November AM To Wright Alice Subject Favor Please call Steve Krimsky anf tell him I am tied up until Ditto for Ben Jacoby Thanks Please send me an email to let me know you got this Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet

RE Invoices Cc Thank you very much Tonya Have a great day Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax Original Message From Dennis Tonya Sent Tuesday November AM To Wright Alice Garcia Julie A Cc Mann Kay Subject RE Invoices I coded the King and Spalding invoices in IPAYIT yesterday Before coding I had to forward the invoices to Ben for his approval So they should be processed and paid soon through IPAYIT Thanks Tonya Original Message From Wright Alice Sent Tuesday November AM To Garcia Julie A Dennis Tonya Cc Mann Kay Subject Invoices Importance High Good morning I forwarded to you over the last three weeks approximately to invoices for codingKay Mann wants to resolve these invoices today Will you please code the invoices as the following or return them to me My last day at Enron is tomorrow pm so if you dont get them to me please process them and inform Kay Mann of the status Coral Energy Cost Center Project Blue Dog Split between Cost Centers and Midway Energy WBS C or Cost Center second choice Thank you very much for your prompt attention to this matter Alice Wright Assistant to Kay Mann Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax

FW Mega ReconfirmationWhich lucky lawyer gets this Please advise Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax Original Message From Denton Rhonda L Sent Thursday October AM To St Clair Carol Cc Wright Alice Subject RE Mega Reconfirmation Alice please reassign to an attorney Thanks Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Thursday October AM To Denton Rhonda L Cc Fitzgerald Genia Wright Alice Cason Sharen Subject RE Mega Reconfirmation Rhonda and Alice Could you ask someone else in the power group to handle this I am swamped with EBS stuff and cant get to it Thanks Original Message From Denton Rhonda L Sent Thu PM To St Clair Carol Cc Fitzgerald Genia Wright Alice Cason Sharen Subject Mega Reconfirmation Heres the deal on this one This deal is part of the deals assigned to Morgan Stanley This index deal has delivery in never exercised and may be exercised As Sharen indicated in her email we are reconfirming confirming to Morgan all forward parts of the deals assigned This confirm was prepared by Steve Wang without benefit of legal review We need legal to review this new confirm It looks just like the old one but without the part in it but there may be language that Steve put in it that could cause heartburn maybe We are just unsure of the language since legal did not prepare the confirm and it is not standard boilerplate confirmation language megaconfirmpdf

RE BNP Netting AgreementEB is reserved from pm to pm Central Alice Wright Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith St EBA Houston Texas Tel Fax Original Message From Murphy Harlan Sent Monday November AM To Schneider Chip Shackleton Sara Cc Wright Alice Subject FW BNP Netting Agreement Ill get a conference room Harlan E Murphy Enron Wholesale Services Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Tel Fax Email Harlan nroncom Original Message From Lech Kalembka ENRON Sent Monday November AM To Cc Murphy Harlan Subject BNP Netting Agreement We are available for a call at PM EST Please let us know if this works for you and your client Thanks Lech Kalembka Cadwalader Wickersham Taft Maiden Lane New York NY Tel Fax Email NOTE The information in this email is confidential and may be legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient you must not read use or disseminate the information Although this email and any attachments are believed to be free of any virus or other defect that might affect any computer system into which it is received and opened it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by Cadwalader Wickersham Taft for any loss or damage arising in any way from its use
